name: Brutal Harvest
description:
READY FOR THE HARVEST?

Some say that the end of the harvest is the most brutal time of the year. Rushing in time to make sure the crops don’t go bad. This year the harvest may have been a bit too abundant, which means war.

Brutal Harvest is a wave based 2.5D shooter focused on collecting crops and defending them between waves. Take on a variety of enemies as they fight back from being harvested.

CONTROLS WASDCharacter Movement.LMBUse WeaponSPACEPick up and drop crops.1,2,3 AND 4Toggle Weapons THE TEAM FROGAWEEProgrammer AVIAN
Artist

This was an entry for Ludum-Dare 52! We hope you enjoy it!
